name: Microsoft Teams Trigger
semantic_context: Triggers workflows in n8n based on events from Microsoft Teams, such as new messages or team updates, using specified configurations.
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Teams Trigger 节点。主要用于: Triggers workflows in n8n based on events from Microsoft Teams, such as new messages or team updates, using specified configurations.

event.name: event
event.description: Select the event to trigger the workflow
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 作用: Select the event to trigger the workflow | 默认值: newChannelMessage
available_options: New Channel (值: newChannel) - A new channel is created
New Channel Message (值: newChannelMessage) - A message is posted to a channel
New Chat (值: newChat) - A new chat is created
New Chat Message (值: newChatMessage) - A message is posted to a chat
New Team Member (值: newTeamMember) - A new member is added to a team

watchAllTeams.name: watchAllTeams
watchAllTeams.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available teams
watchAllTeams.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch All Teams | 作用: Whether to watch for the event in all the available teams | 默认值: False

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Select a team from the list, enter an ID or a URL
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team | 作用: Select a team from the list, enter an ID or a URL | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

watchAllChannels.name: watchAllChannels
watchAllChannels.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available channels
watchAllChannels.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch All Channels | 作用: Whether to watch for the event in all the available channels | 默认值: False

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Select a channel from the list, enter an ID or a URL
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: Select a channel from the list, enter an ID or a URL | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

watchAllChats.name: watchAllChats
watchAllChats.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available chats
watchAllChats.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch All Chats | 作用: Whether to watch for the event in all the available chats | 默认值: False

chatId.name: chatId
chatId.description: Select a chat from the list, enter an ID or a URL
chatId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat | 作用: Select a chat from the list, enter an ID or a URL | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)
